OOC: Add this to my last.

"I'm happy that you feel better... " said sweetly the femme, that 
added in low voice and in Orchestra's ear "my love..."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> "She's Kitkat" said Blacknightmare "She's a Predacon and she was 
attacked a time ago..."
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: dcoburn 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Wednesday, March 21, 2001 6:44 PM
>   Subject: All of my Decepticons(and some other chars)
> 
> 
>   ::Orchestra/Composer/Skullgrin/Triggerhappy/Cutthroat/
>   Quatro/Bodicons::
>    
>        Orchestra walked around, and saw Blacknightmare.  He walked 
up to her.
>    
>        "I've recovered from my wounds love.  Tell me, who was that?
(Referring to KitKat)" Orchestra asked.
>   ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>        Composer went into the old Alliance base, and brought back 
an old, CR Chamber, and sat it on the ground.
>    
>        "Yup, we're almost done," he said in reply to Wheeljack.
>   ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>        Skullgrin arrived back at the base after a while.  He saw 
the battle between Motormaster and Megatron.  This was obviously a 
battle to decide who would be leader.  Skullgrin transformed to robot 
mode.
>    
>        "MEGATRON!!!  Leader, it's you!!  Forget Motormaster, let's 
go Megatron!!!!  I've always been loyal to you!!" Skullgrin cheered.
>   ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>          Triggerhappy arrived quickly in his jet mode.  He landed 
and transformed to robot mode as well.  He didn;t say anything, his 
jaw dropped as far as a transformer can drop their jaw.  Megatron!  
What a great but also scary sight!
>   ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>         Cutthroat arrived at the base.  He landed and transformed 
back to robot mode.
>    
>          "Megatron and Motormaster here!  Me want fight!!!!!!" 
Cutthroat sneered.
>    
>           Cutthroat drew his weapon and fired a shot at Megatron 
then at Motormaster.
>   ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>          Quatro kept going in hoverbike mode until he found the 
Maximal base.  He stopped and transformed into robot mode.
>    
>          "Transformer Faction:Maximals
>           Maximal Warship:Cybertronian Fire
>           Status:Crashed, Housing Maximals," Quatro said out some 
data he found on the Maximals and there base.
>    
>            Quatro searched for more information on the Maximals, 
their enemies in particular.
>    
>            *General Maximal Enemies:Predacons,Decepticons* Quatro's 
results stated.  
>    
>            *Some Specific Enemies:Hell Beast,Megatron,Drill Bit, 
Killfest, Darkfate* 
>    
>            Quatro looked up info on Megatron.
>    
>             *Megatron:Decepticon Commander*
>    
>             Quatro was puzzled for 2 milliseconds, but then looked 
back up on the deceased Megatron he had scanned out.
>    
>             *Megatron:Predacon Commander*
>    
>             "Hmm," Quatro thought to himself,"I should be able to 
get just as good a reward for killing Megatron of the Decepticons as 
if I killed Megatron of the Predacons.  Ha!  For now, I should side 
with these Maximals.  I may be able to collect more specific 
propaganda on my bounty."
>    
>              Quatro searched his endless collection of data for the 
leader of these Maximals.
>    
>               *Faction Leader:Iron Raptor*
>    
>               Quatro opened a special communications link with Iron 
Raptor.(He doesn't need no special wrist device or anything, he has a 
special device planted inside of him, so he can talk like normal 
except over long distances and when he is engaged in a long distance 
conversation his eyes glow blue instead of green)
>    
>              "Iron Raptor, leader of the Maximals, I am universal 
bounty hunter Quatro, and I came to Earth to kill Hell Beast and 
Megatron.  I was thinking that I could side with you for a while, and 
we may be able to help eachother," Quatro said.
>   ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>          Decapitron, Legtrap, Headshot, Gutclaw and Explobody 
arrived back at the base.  
>    
>          "It's Megatron!  Fighting with Motormaster!  Don't get 
involved, just watch," Decapitron said to his fellow Bodicons.
>    
>            
> 
>         Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
>
